<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create recurring payment by Creditor Account"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/receiver/recurring/payment/pix/creditor-account"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a Recurring Payment, using the creditor's bank account information.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Payload for Recurring Payment with creditor account.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["creditorAccount"],"type":"object","allOf":[{"required":["clientRequestId","recurringConsentPactualId","date","amount","riskSignals","document"],"type":"object","properties":{"clientRequestId":{"description":"Unique identifier provided by the client. Used as idempotency and response correlation.","type":"string"},"recurringConsentPactualId":{"description":"BTG's unique ID of the Recurring Consent.","type":"string"},"date":{"description":"Date in which the payment will be made. Format: yyyy-MM-dd.","type":"string","format":"date"},"amount":{"format":"int64","description":"Transaction amount in cents. Ex: R$25.34 is 2534.","type":"integer"},"remittanceInformation":{"description":"Additional information on a payment, to be sent to the recipient.","type":"string"},"riskSignals":{"description":"Recurring Payment risk signals. One of the objects must be informed.","type":"object","properties":{"manual":{"required":["deviceId","isRootedDevice","screenBrightness","elapsedTimeSinceBoot","osVersion","userTimeZoneOffset","language","screenDimensions","accountTenure"],"description":"Manual payment risk signals. This must be informed when the payment happens in the presence of the user.","type":"object","properties":{"deviceId":{"description":"Unique ID of the device.","type":"string"},"isRootedDevice":{"description":"Indicates if the device has the root permission.","type":"boolean"},"screenBrightness":{"description":"Current screen brightness. For Android it's an integer between 0 and 255. For iOS, it's a float number between 0.0 and 1.0.","type":"number"},"elapsedTimeSinceBoot":{"description":"How long the device has been on, in milliseconds.","type":"integer"},"osVersion":{"description":"Device's operational system version.","type":"string"},"userTimeZoneOffset":{"description":"Device's timezone in UTC offset: +-hh[:mm].","type":"string"},"language":{"description":"Device's language configuration, in ISO 639-1 format.","type":"string"},"screenDimensions":{"description":"Screen dimensions.","type":"object","properties":{"height":{"description":"Device's screen height, in pixels.","type":"integer"},"width":{"description":"Device's screen width, in pixels.","type":"integer"}}},"accountTenure":{"description":"Date that the user was registered in the ITP. This must be sent if the user allowed this information to be collected.","type":"boolean"},"isDevModeEnabled":{"description":"Indicates if the device is on developer mode.","type":"boolean"},"isMockGPS":{"description":"Indicates if the device is using a mock GPS.","type":"boolean"},"isEmulated":{"description":"Indicates if the device is emulated or real.","type":"boolean"},"isMonkeyRunner":{"description":"Indicates the use of MonkeyRunner.","type":"boolean"},"isCharging":{"description":"Indicates if the device's battery is being charged.","type":"boolean"},"antennaInformation":{"description":"Indicates in which antenna the device is connected.","type":"string"},"isUsbConnected":{"description":"Indicates if the device is connected to another one via USB.","type":"boolean"},"integrity":{"description":"The integrity of the device and app. In Android according to Play API Integrity, in iOS according to App Attest.","type":"object","properties":{"appRecognitionVerdict":{"description":"App's integrity.","type":"string"},"deviceRecognitionVerdict":{"description":"Device's integrity.","type":"string"}}}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentRiskSignalsManual"},"automatic":{"required":["lastLoginDateTime"],"description":"Automatic payment risk signals. This must be informed when the payment happens without the presence of the user.","type":"object","properties":{"lastLoginDateTime":{"description":"Date and time of the last time the user has logged in the ITP. Format: RFC-3339 specification, UTC.","type":"string","format":"date"},"pixKeyRegistrationDateTime":{"description":"Date and time of the pix key registration. This must be informed if the payment is created using a pix key.  Format: RFC-3339 specification, UTC.","type":"string","format":"date"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentRiskSignalsAutomatic"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentRiskSignals"},"document":{"description":"Object containing document information","required":["identification","rel"],"type":"object","properties":{"identification":{"description":"The number of the document","type":"string","title":"Identification"},"rel":{"description":"The type of document (CPF/CNPJ)","type":"string","title":"Rel"}},"title":"Document"},"tags":{"description":"Tags that can be sent by the client, it will be saved on the Entity, use as a metadata field","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["tag1","tag2"],"title":"Tags"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentRequest"},{"type":"object"}],"properties":{"creditorAccount":{"type":"object","properties":{"ispb":{"description":"ISPB (Brazilian Payments System Identifier) of the SPI (Instant Payments System) participant with numbers only.","type":"string"},"issuer":{"description":"Account issuing agency code without digit. Required for the following account types: CACC, SVGS.","type":"string"},"number":{"description":"Account number, with a check digit (if it exists), if there is an alphanumeric value, it must be converted to 0.","type":"string"},"accountType":{"description":"Types of accounts: \r\n\r\nCACC (Current Account).\r\n SVGS (Savings Account).\r\nTRAN (Transacting Account - Prepaid Payment Account)","enum":["CACC","SVGS","TRAN"],"type":"string","title":"ObkAccountType"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringAccount"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentCreditorAccountRequest"}}},"required":true}}
